official_title: Marijuana in Combination With Opioids for Pain and Symptom Control in Hospice Patients
inclusion_criteria:
* Age > 18
* Alert adults
* requiring opioids for pain management (routine)
* cancer diagnosis or non-cancer diagnosis as their terminal illness
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* pregnant women
* Age < 18
* minimally or unresponsive patients unable to take oral medications
* agitated combative patients
